game.name: Woofy Run
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Woofy Run은 속도, 전략, 그리고 방해가 어우러진 멀티플레이어 개 경주 게임입니다. 함정을 설치하고 장애물을 피하며 각 맵에서 상위 10명의 플레이어가 되기 위해 경쟁하세요! 좋아하는 강아지를 선택하고 경주에 참여하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Woofy Run is a multiplayer dog racing game where speed, strategy, and sabotage come together. Set traps, avoid obstacles, and race to be one of the top 10 fastest players on every map! Select your favourite dog and join the race!
